questions.question_text: How many times is i checked in the following program?
questions.explanation: The condition i < 3 is checked 4 times: initially (i=0), after i=1, after i=2, and finally after i=3 when the loop terminates

questions.question_text: Pointing to a photograph of a man, Pooja said, 'He is the only son of the mother of my sister's brother.' How is that person related to Pooja?
questions.explanation: The person in the photograph is Pooja's brother - 'My sister's brother' = Pooja's brother, 'Mother of my brother' = Pooja's mother, 'Only son of Pooja's mother' = Pooja's brother

questions.question_text: If School A has more admissions than School B and School C has fewer admissions than School B, then the statement 'School A has fewer admissions than School C' is:
questions.explanation: Using transitive property: A > B > C therefore A cannot have fewer admissions than C

questions.question_text: A major advantage of inheritance is:
questions.option_a: Reducing the time it takes to create new objects
questions.option_b: Not having to think about how objects will be used
questions.option_c: Reducing the amount of memory required to execute a program
questions.option_d: Enabling people who have not studied programming to create useful applications
questions.explanation: Inheritance enables code reuse and reduces the time required to create new objects by building on existing classes

questions.question_text: How many times is the i value checked in the following C program?
questions.explanation: i is checked 4 times: i=0, i=1, i=2, and finally i=3 when the condition fails and loop terminates
